product_overview: JusValida is a SaaS platform leveraging AI to analyze, validate, and suggest improvements in Brazilian legal documents, enhancing efficiency and accuracy for legal professionals.
core_goals: Reduce legal document analysis time by up to 80%
Increase accuracy in identifying legal risks
Democratize access to quality legal analysis
key_features: AI-powered document analysis with support for multiple AI providers (OpenAI GPT-5, Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4, Google Gemini 2.5 Pro)
Document upload and text input across multiple legal formats with automatic validation
Template-based analysis specialized for Brazilian law documents
Credit-based payment system integrated with Stripe, including flexible plans and transaction tracking
Batch processing system for multiple documents with queue management and progress tracking
User authentication and role management via Supabase with password recovery
Administrative dashboard for user management, system configuration, and analytics
Customer support ticket system featuring real-time messaging and priority management
Landing page showcasing platform features, pricing, and authentication
Dashboard presenting analytics, recent analyses, and quick actions
Soft delete (trash) management with recovery options
Email notification system with SMTP integration
Comprehensive API endpoints supporting all platform functionalities
user_flow_summary: User visits landing page and reviews product benefits
User registers an account and receives free credits
User logs into dashboard and uploads documents for analysis via file upload or text input
User selects analysis type and AI provider, then initiates document analysis
System processes documents and displays detailed results with recommendations
User can download, share, or start new analyses; manage profile and billing from dashboard
Admin users manage system users, configurations, and review analytics
Users submit support tickets and communicate with support team for issue resolution
validation_criteria: Successful user registration and authentication with role-based access
Accurate AI-driven analysis across multiple document types and AI providers
Seamless batch processing with real-time progress tracking
Proper credit deduction and payment handling integrated with Stripe
Consistent administrative control and monitoring capabilities
Responsive and intuitive user interface across all pages
Reliable email notifications and support system workflow
Data security ensured through encryption and privacy compliance
Error rates within acceptable limits and system uptime above 99.9%
